content: Our OpEx from Macau for the fourth quarter of 2022 came in at approximately $1.7 million per day, a slight increase from the per $1.6 million per day in 3Q 2022 but in line with prior quarters. The kind of cool thing that Lawrence mentioned for us as well is that where we were back at the end of the fourth quarter of 2019, we're going to have approximately 10% less FTEs at the end of 2023 when everything is open for Phase 2 with all our properties in Macau.
